oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville, the workings of the City under its new form of government: a statement in detail showing financial operations from October 1, 1883, to September 30, 1884, Reports of the various officers connected with the different departments, compiled for publication by James T. Bell
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An official publication of the City of Nashville, Tennessee, titled “Nashville, the workings of the City under its new form of government: a statement in detail showing financial operations from October 1, 1883, to September 30, 1884, Reports of the various officers connected with the different departments, compiled for publication by James T. Bell.” Mayor C. Hooper Phillips is pictured in the frontispiece of the book. Forms part of the Publications Collection: Nashville, the Workings of the City under its New Form of Government, A Statement in Detail showing Financial Operations from October 1, 1883, to September 30, 1884, Reports of the Various Officers Connected with the Different Departments, compiled for publication by James T. Bell, Recorder. 1 book publication.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Phillips, C. Hooper; Bell, James T.
